Package com.bitsavior.screens

Class ScreenManager

java.lang.Object
com.bitsavior.screens.ScreenManager
public class ScreenManager
extends java.lang.Object
This Class holds and manages the Screens

TODO for new screens:

  • Screens.java: add the enum to access it

    • Method Details

      • showScreen

        public void showScreen​(Screens screenName)
        shows the requested screen
        Parameters:
        screenName - e.g.: "Screens.TITLE" ; consider screen comments!

      • gameIsRunning

        public boolean gameIsRunning()
        true if the GameScreen is not null
        Returns:
        : true if the game is running false when the game isn't running

      • setGameLevel

        public void setGameLevel​(int level)
        sets the GameScreen or replaces the existing one

        has to be set before the GameScreen can be shown

        Parameters:
        level - currently only 1

      • getGameLevel

        public int getGameLevel()
        the current Level of the GameScreen; not used at the moment due to only one level
        Returns:
        : the current level

      • setWinStats

        public void setWinStats​(int time, int bugs, int gameLevel)
        deletes old and creates new WinScreen
        Parameters:
        time - time left
        bugs - bugs left
        gameLevel - : current level

      • setLoseStats

        public void setLoseStats()
        deletes old and creates new LoseScreen

      • dispose

        public void dispose()
        disposes title-, game-, win-, lose-, settingsScreen

        (if not already null/disposed)
